required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Tepotinib on Pharmacokinetics (PK) of Cytochrome P450 (CYP) 3A Substrate Midazolam
clinical_study.official_title: Phase 1, Open-label, Single Sequence, Two-Period Crossover Trial to Evaluate the Effect of Tepotinib on Cytochrome P450 (CYP) 3A by Investigating the Pharmacokinetics of the CYP3A Substrate Midazolam in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The study will investigate the effect of tepotinib on the PK of the CYP3A substrate midazolam determined from concentrations of midazolam and its main metabolite 1-hydroxymidazolam in healthy participants.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: This is a single sequence cross-over trial.

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero to Last Measurable Concentration (AUC0-t) of Midazolam
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 48 hours post-dose on Day 1 of Period 1

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero to Last Measurable Concentration (AUC0-t) of Midazolam
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 48 hours post-dose on Day 11 of Period 2

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero to Infinity (AUC0-inf) of Midazolam
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 48 hours post-dose on Day 1 of Period 1

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero to Infinity (AUC0-inf) of Midazolam
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 48 hours post-dose on Day 11 of Period 2

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of Midazolam
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 48 hours post-dose on Day 1 of Period 1

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of Midazolam
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 48 hours post-dose on Day 11 of Period 2

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Maximum Plasma Concentration (Tmax) of Midazolam
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 48 hours post-dose on Day 1 of Period 1 and Day 11 of Period 2
Pre-dose up to 48 hours post-dose on Day 1 of Period 1 and Day 11 of Period 2

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero to Last Measurable Concentration (AUC0-t) of Midazolam Metabolite 1-hydroxymidazolam
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 48 hours post-dose on Day 1 of Period 1 and Day 11 of Period 2

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero to Infinity (AUC0-inf) of Midazolam Metabolite 1-hydroxymidazolam
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 48 hours post-dose on Day 1 of Period 1 and Day 11 of Period 2

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of Midazolam Metabolite 1-hydroxymidazolam
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 48 hours post-dose on Day 1 of Period 1 and Day 11 of Period 2

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Maximum Plasma Concentration (Tmax) of Midazolam Metabolite 1-hydroxymidazolam
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 48 hours post-dose on Day 1 of Period 1 and Day 11 of Period 2
Pre-dose up to 48 hours post-dose on Day 1 of Period 1 and Day 11 of Period 2

secondary_outcome.measure: Metabolic Ratio of Midazolam and Midazolam Metabolite 1-hydroxymidazolam
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 48 hours post-dose on Day 1 of Period 1 and Day 11 of Period 2
secondary_outcome.description: Metabolic ratio will be calculated as AUC 0-infinity of midazolam divided by AUC 0-infinity of 1-hydroxymidazolam.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Changes in Laboratory Assessments, 12-lead Electrocardiogram (ECG) Findings and Vital Signs
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with clinically significant changes will be reported.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Midazolam, then tepotinib followed by midazolam + tepotinib
arm_group.description: Participants will receive a single oral dose of midazolam on Day 1 of treatment period 1 followed by daily single oral dose of tepotinib from Day 1 to Day 10 of treatment period 2 and then co-administration of tepotinib and midazolam on Day 11 of treatment period 2.

intervention.description: Participant will receive single oral dose of midazolam on Day 1 of treatment period 1 and co-administration of tepotinib and midazolam on Day 11 of treatment period 2.
intervention.arm_group_label: Midazolam, then tepotinib followed by midazolam + tepotinib

intervention.description: Participants will receive single oral dose of tepotinib for 10 days in treatment period 2.
intervention.arm_group_label: Midazolam, then tepotinib followed by midazolam + tepotinib

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy participants of non-child bearing potential
- Body weight between 50 to 100 kilogram (kg)
- Body mass index (BMI) between 18.5 and 29.9 kilogram per meter square (kg/m^2)
- Other protocol defined inclusion criteria could apply
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participation in a clinical study within 60 days prior to first drug administration
- Whole blood donation or loss of greater than 450 milliliter (mL) within 60 days prior to first drug administration
- Any surgical or medical condition, or any other significant disease that could interfere with the study objectives, conduct, or evaluation
- Other protocol defined exclusion criteria could apply
